description: The Easy Way to Boost Your Business
overview:
BizEquity Corp. was founded and launched in 2008 to empower small business owners with tools and information to help determine the estimated value of their businesses.

According to a BizEquity survey conducted by Chamberlain Research Consultants, 65.8% of small business owners don’t know how to quantify or calculate the financial value they’ve created in their businesses. A small business, like a home, is often one of a person’s main assets. While it’s relatively easy to determine the value of a home, it has been difficult and expensive for most business owners to evaluate the worth of a small business. BizEquity.com helps eliminate this challenge.

BizEquity valuations also help small business owners understand how they stack up to their competition, whether their competitors are down the street or across the country. Business owners will also be able to compare their businesses with industry and national benchmarks.

BizEquity Corp. is incubated and funded by Advanta Ventures Inc. and has an advisory board of leading academics and small business experts.
